txt.en: The icon upon this object looks like some kind of animal with horns, but it has an evil-looking air about it. Perhaps Saeradan will be able to make some sense of it.

'What is this that you have for me? Aye, I have seen this symbol before. I am not sure what it is supposed to represent, but it reminds me of some of the demons that Gwyllion summoned against us in the Windfells.'
You found an object carved with a strange and evil-looking icon.
Bring the evil object to Saeradan at the Rohirrim scout-camp
Saeradan is at the Rohirrim scout-camp.\n\nYou should bring the evil object to Saeradan for his examination.
